long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The historious extension will allow you to easily bookmark sites on https://historio.us. It gives you a button that you can press on any page to save it on historio.us and easily find it again by searching for any term in its contents.

historious is a free service, and the extension is also provided for free.
